course.subject: LANG
course.name: Critical Reading and Speaking in Chinese
course.description: This course targets students who enter HKUST with a good command of the Chinese Language and who wish to raise their proficiency level in reading and speaking. The focus of this course is on critical reading and higher-order thinking skills, and the ability to produce coherent speech showing clarity of thought, sophistication in language use, as well as clear and accurate speech in spoken Putonghua. Students' learning experience is enhanced by a range of classroom and outside-class activities involving them in reading, critiquing, researching and speaking tasks. Students with qualifications equivalent to the prerequisite may seek instructor's approval for enrollment in the course.
course.prerequisites: Level 4 or above in HKDSE Chinese
course.exclusions: LANG 1116, LANG 1120, LANG 1121, LANG 1122, LANG 1123, LANG 1124, LANG 1125, LANG 1126, LANG 1127

reviews.author: 孤獨的美食家
reviews.title: 普通話堂，奶共咪高分
reviews.comment_content:
完全冇教過野，話就話教說話技能分析技巧
第一樣學嘅係點樣分別新聞標題，學左之後唔會用得番，乜野‘主謂式‘ 學黎有乜用?
之後學乜Presentation技巧，又話乜演講，基本上係你已經識嘅野
上堂根本完全學唔到野，仲要比幾十蚊買本爛鬼書，仲要同啲中國人上堂，聽佢地啲話，慘過死。
一直唔明點解中文要用普通話教
點解唔可以分班? 就因為唔想請香港人黎教? 定係政治原因?
reviews.comment_teaching:
周彤，典型中國人。教得一般，因為基本上冇內容佢教，但佢頭1 2堂會執讀音同停連，還可以。之後分左組就叫你自己請教你嗰組個中國人。
堂堂都叫討論，比啲無聊議題你。
assignment題目就自訂，但佢唔會比你討論有關反對中國嘅議題。
上堂時候成日話自己落到香港，又身為教師，政治中立
但你一講中國啲負面新聞佢就反駁你，跟住黑面。又唔鍾意人遲到，過15分鐘當abs
不過聽聞教中文全部都係咁
reviews.comment_grading:
爛，但佢永遠唔出分，唔知自己去到邊
LANG出名爛，再者係睇tutor心情，刷鞋，同鄉咪高分，好合理
問班上同學大部份都C range~ B-
我就食左個C嘅。自問上堂正正常常，係一話新聞分享就拎政治新聞
唔排除係政見問題，睇你點睇
reviews.comment_workload:
3份‘評估‘Solo, 組隊, Solo.
第一份Oral 佢會有~5篇新聞，要你評佢地中立性，流暢度，有冇說服力同有乜啟發， pre晒5份，考果時抽
第二份係組隊拍片，要扮唔同角色，扮城市論壇咁。
我本來條topic係‘大學應減少非本地生學位‘，比周彤bam左，強行要我地做‘大學應否增加學位‘
我唔信咁改冇政治含意
第3份係solo演講，比個場合你，前提都比埋，叫你自己作topic, 好似5分鐘，堂上live，之後要答同學問題。
Overall黎計好煩，仲要deadline成日撞MT, Essay, etc

reviews.author: ft
reviews.title: 識reg一定reg 1114！
reviews.comment_teaching: 呢個course邊個教都係差唔多架喇
reviews.comment_grading:
Grading distribution已經唔重要
assessment前:
會有輔導，但都係廢話，完全冇幫助

assessment後:
只會講全班整體表現，問佢feedback都係d呀媽係女人既feedback，而且冇分睇，成個course 3個assessment連半個分都冇出過。最後就出個c range比你喇，透明度係0
(見到前面有位同學話同政見問題有關...我懷疑都唔知係咪因為我係論壇既立場係反水貨客/自由行)
reviews.comment_workload: 最煩係拍片，好似係25分鐘既論壇，全程唔可以見到有稿，所以普通話好普通既就唔好reg喇! 一黎自己錄到1999，二黎分組每組都會至少1個mainland，所以講得差仲要比佢xyz我

reviews.author: Jason Au
reviews.title: Good if u are good in PTH
reviews.comment_content: quite interesting if u are into it, but not really useful for your university life since you will probably not use Chinese again after this course.
reviews.comment_teaching: Well teaching skills, at least you will not feel boring during the class
reviews.comment_grading: good if you are already good in putonghua, but no need to worry even you don't, since the pronunciation doesn't really count that much in marking scheme.
reviews.comment_workload: low work load, only one group task are required out of class, all of the others can be finished in class.

reviews.comment_content:
垃圾。

頭幾堂基本上都係度學普通話。總共有三個Task，三個Task都係考普通話。然後第三個Task個setting係個演講，順便考埋你presentation skills。

基本上普通話好既話就好易過關。但係普通話唔好既話就真係唔好作賤自己去讀。

讀完之後唔覺得學到d乜野。
reviews.comment_teaching:
Instructor幾好人，上堂會搞下氣氛。講野唔悶同埋幾有心教，但係就係個Course d內容真係好垃圾。

我又冇覺得話一定要親中先可以靚grade，因為個Instructor立埸其實都幾中立。係一個幾好既Instructor，而且應該算靚grade，感覺佢比全班既grade都唔差。
reviews.comment_grading:
普通話好就好grade；普通話差就爛grade。

三個task都會出feedback，佢出feedback既時侯會講你既表現屬於咩grade。大約可以估到自己咩grade。

自問普通話唔錯，三個task評價都係A左右，最後A。
reviews.comment_workload:
如果普通話好既話，Workload唔大。就純粹每一個task都要寫定講稿。最後個演講task一定要背，同埋一定要prep足。

不過盡量唔好走堂，佢好似好記得冇返既人。

reviews.author: cathy41lau
reviews.comment_content:
Focus on presentation skills, speech organization
But talk less on pronunciation
reviews.comment_teaching:
Quite good, the professor was often funny, students mostly enjoy the class
But professor likes tongue twisters a lot. He always spend the beginning 20 minutes of the class to play the tongue twister game...
reviews.comment_grading:
Good grading.
According to the professor, if you get a "5' in each sub-grade in the assignments, you can already get a B or B+ as the final grade. It is the mean grade for the course.
reviews.comment_workload:
Not much or I can say no workload...
Just need to work hard before the assignments

reviews.author: LLO
reviews.title: nice course
reviews.comment_content:
actually i learn nothing in this course.
this course required us to study for 3 chapters.
and first two are really useless and also unmeaningful.
but the last project is to take a 25 mins video about a topic decided by ourselves.
its quite interesting and also funny.
but this course TAKE ATTENDANCE (MAX 5 LESSON CAN BE SKIPPED)
reviews.comment_teaching:
nice lesson atmosphere.
Wendy will talk to us during lesson and also share lots of news and her opinion.
and giving a lot of critical idea on each social issues.
but as she is not the coordinator of the course (Ren Tao is), she usually cannot make any judgement on the requirement of the assignment and we need to ask Ren Tao by ourselves.
reviews.comment_grading:
actually i dunno what mark i got in all 3 assessment.
but my putonghua actually is not that good, or even bad, also i skip all my quota (5 lesson) and i am expecting a c or c+,
but i finally got a B+.
reviews.comment_workload:
very low in class workload, jus talking, discussing and chatting.
NO writing work, NO essay, NO midterm, NO final.
But need 3 speaking assignment / assessment.

reviews.author: hihi
reviews.title: 任濤, 大陸人喱, 無乜料到
reviews.comment_content:
-內容: 吹水, 無乜用
-Useless, really useless
-shame that he teaches something we all know and still feeling pround of himself
-you will learn some correct pronounciation of mandarin
reviews.comment_teaching:
-大陸喱一件, 上堂無prepare, 齋up
-上堂拖時間
-成日串香港人
-要奶共
-he is such a crap
-always pretend to teach but actually stalling for time
-he is here just for a job and salary
reviews.comment_grading:
-無奶共, 全組好比心機,C+
-想高分一定要奶共
-if you say something he likes, you can get B or Above
-the keypoint is to please him and he will have good impression on you
-always answer his dumb question in class also help with your participation marks
-dont say anything against China, he hates it
-Girls is a plus,some say he tends to give good grade to girls
reviews.comment_workload:
-好多野:video, present, 比分好緊
-regret to take it
-想高分一定要奶共
-Very heavy

reviews.author: Plasticsmile
reviews.comment_content:
No content at all.
No critical thinking.
Just learn how to speak better Mandarin, and some organization skills (that you've already known).
If you can speak well in Mandarin already, congrats, you can easily get a good grade in this course.
If you can't, ......good chance for you to learn =)
reviews.comment_teaching:
Ms Lau is very nice and I feel quite relaxing in her lesson.
She sometimes talked about her funny experiences in Mainland China.
She has taught us the pronunciation and that's quite interesting coz the whole class kept saying "a e i o u" with a silly face lol.
reviews.comment_grading:
Quite a good grade for such a little workload.
Actually I have spent really really little time on this course and I got an B at the end.
No matter how good (or bad) your Madarin is, just feel free to talk and don't be shy. It doesn't really affect the grade.
reviews.comment_workload:
Some short presentations in class, just a little (or even no) preparation is okay.
One video-taking discussion as a "group project".
No Midterm. No Final.

reviews.author: 1_chris
reviews.title: 正常Grading
reviews.comment_content: 冇乜內容, 完全睇唔出點解叫 "Critical Reading and Speaking", 依加比我揀多次我會揀上1114, 雖然都係冇內容, 不過起碼唔洗比人屈晒機 Haha
reviews.comment_teaching:
都係一個字悶架啦; 本身課程都悶, 加埋佢講野既Tone...
唯一特別少少既地方係呢位Instructor唔係親共 Lol 成日傾時事佢都唔撐共產黨 Haha
reviews.comment_grading:
1) 口頭評議時事文章, 預先比定D文章你, 考個陣就抽一篇評論, 20%
2) 時事論壇小組, 要錄影20/25分鐘, 35%
3) 公開演講, 自己預備個Topic講幾分鐘, 35%
4) Participation, 10%

FYI
唔同之前既Review, 呢位Instructor係有比返D分我地睇 :)
每個Assessment都係Average既分, 最後B左, 自問普通話一般, 所以都算係咁 :)
reviews.comment_workload: Workload就冇乜既, 都係上堂吹下水咁, 冇乜特別野要預備

reviews.author: ob
reviews.title: 輕輕鬆鬆攞好grade
reviews.comment_content: 冇乜內容, "Critical Reading and Speaking"好虛, 但好在平時上堂都輕輕鬆鬆。基本上就係比下片你睇，比D野你聽，跟住就做Assignment
reviews.comment_teaching: 一開始覺得有D悶，不過之後發現佢唔係極左既老師，好多時都鼓勵同學理性討論，最緊要係唔會ban晒你既意見同諗法，仲會虛心同你認真討論
reviews.comment_grading:
有3份assignment
第1份偷睇到係全5
第2份應該有5有6
第3份完全睇唔到....
上堂有認真答問題，全班都一齊yo個instructor，最後冇聽過有人攞C range! 所以比反應好緊要！
走左兩堂，最後B+
reviews.comment_workload: Workload得3份assignment，算超低workload!上堂吹下水咁, 冇乜特別野要預備

reviews.author: Cloud
reviews.comment_content:
圍繞幾個TOPIC去做TASK
第一個TASK就係分析／評論新聞
第二個TASK就係小組論壇 要代入唔同角色黎講／表達意見
第三個TASK就係演講 就對象同埋你個主題黎講四分鐘
其實本書真心無用
都係同普通話堂無咩分別
reviews.comment_teaching:
李老師係一個幾好既老師
開SEM頭幾堂好快就記得全班人
上堂都幾好笑
一開始就同早到既人傾計
會針對你個TASK既表現比意見
敏感話題其實大家都避免講
政治方面既野佢都會講少少 當然唔係課堂重點佢都唔會講太多
上堂最好收埋電話 佢會鬧 尤其係人地講緊野／討論時
但係就上堂黎講佢都唔錯 個氣氛幾輕鬆
reviews.comment_grading:
分就永遠都唔會知 但佢會係堂上比意見／評價
大家聽完都大概估到自己水平
好彩今次全班都係local
d task 佢比既評價都幾好
local
自己普通話發音ok
DSE speaking level 4
最後 A左
reviews.comment_workload:
無咩功課 有時要準備
但係一定要做
如果佢知你無做 佢會黑面
d task 準備其實都唔會用太多時間
佢都會用一堂來幫你改自己個speech

reviews.author: KL
reviews.title: 識講普通話就Reg啦
reviews.comment_content: 前面位同學講得幾清楚，呢個course冇野學，又無聊又無用
reviews.comment_teaching: instructor任濤，人品ok，頭兩堂嚴肅d，但同大家熟少少之後就變得幾nice。中意分享自己親身經歷。上堂討論過佔中，佢都幾中立，冇提出自己ge政治主張，都冇批評人。我覺得佢都幾關注每個學生，根據唔同人ge性格來俾建議，對提升說話技巧都有d幫助。其實說話好唔好主要都係靠自己識得多同轉數快，呢d冇得教。但佢可以教下你點樣present自己。
reviews.comment_grading: 我自己普通話ok，DSE中文說話5**，最後摞A。如果講普通話講得唔順或者唔識講野就唔好上啦，費事難為自己。一班20個人有3個mainland，佢地都唔算屈機，因為普通話只係評分準則ge部分，個人說話技巧先係重點。
reviews.comment_workload: 因為唔使寫野，所以幾輕鬆，但deadline成日撞midterm都幾頭痕。

reviews.author: Andrew Lau
reviews.title: 靚grade
reviews.comment_content: 自問上堂唔係好積極，最後負負66都有個A-。其實只要平時唔好缺席唔好遲到，每次個老師問問題嗰陣答下佢，等佢對你印象深刻，同埋小組討論嘅時候nice啲講多啲，你平時分就已經好好。至於時事品論，論壇project，都系好易就攞到靚grade。

reviews.author: cplus
reviews.title: miss好好人好好grade
reviews.comment_content: 買左一本書，不過其實係無咩用。主要speaking課堂靠你講，有一個同學仔真係有見學期尾普通話有進步。不過都係要靠自己多講野
reviews.comment_teaching: miss好好人，哈哈，課堂好輕鬆，我見其他評論話要奶共，其實完全唔係。氣氛好自由
reviews.comment_grading:
absolute grade
本身以為可以攞aplus，最後只得a，都有小小sad。不過我同grp既人，派grade都有贊miss，咁應該幾靚grade
reviews.comment_workload: 輕鬆，主要分完組，課堂上面討論。無課後功課，最多有d資料叫你prepare，google幾分鐘就ok

reviews.author: TCheung
reviews.title: Be considered before you take this course
reviews.comment_content:
Mainly focus on the organisation of a speech, sometimes on the pronunciation of Mandarin.

Although there is "Critical Reading" in the course name, only few readings are required to read.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Good teaching. The instructor is friendly, so the class atmosphere was very relaxed. Around half of the class time is used for us to discuss, there were only a few things to teach.

The feedbacks are always positive, like "good", "very good", "excellent", etc.. If she doesn't say "good" to you, you are in danger...
reviews.comment_grading:
Relatively bad grading compared to LANG1114.

More than a half of the students were mainland in my class, and they have advanced backgrounds. Not only the pronunciation, their organisation is usually good too. It is difficult, but of course possible, to get a good grade.

Luckily, a small number of locals with poor pronunciation still take this course, so if your Mandarin is not bad, you will at least get B range.

I got 5* in DSE speaking, however, still got B- in this course. And you will never know what your marks are in each of the presentations.
reviews.comment_workload:
The workload is light, and this is one of the reasons why still a number of locals choose this course.

What you need to do is just be prepared to speak. Nothing you need to hand in.
